proposal: Hey there, DeFarming Protocol community! Congrats on reaching 17 holders on the ETH network - that's no small potatoes! 🥔 Your innovative approach to deflation farming and volatility farming is quite the talk of the town. Imagine coupling that with our DEX or Lottery tools, where anyone from the community can deploy and share in the revenue. It's like adding a cherry on top of your already delicious Debase mechanism sundae. 🍒 Let's chat about how we can make this happen!
